params.name: data

params.name: data.serving_config
params.description: Required. The source ServingConfig resource name . Format: projects/{project_number}/locations/{location_id}/catalogs/{catalog_id}/servingConfigs/{serving_config_id}

params.name: data.control_id
params.description: Required. The id of the control to apply. Assumed to be in the same catalog as the serving config - if id is not found a NOT_FOUND error is returned.
